concept.title: Should the drawing text also be translated and localized?
concept.shortdesc: Learn how to translate and localize the drawing text.

conbody.p: Yes, the text on the drawings also should be translated and localized.
Place the text on a separate layer and avoid text fragmentation.
If possible, use formats or exports that are compatible with CAT solutions (e.g., SVG).
If User Interface is also localized, handle screen captures.
